thread.title: Homeland Security: Central Americans Outnumber Mexicans Seized at U.S. Border
thread.title_full: Homeland Security: Central Americans Outnumber Mexicans Seized at U.S. Border - NBC News

author: NMEast
text: Charge Mexico $10,000.00 or more, for each Central American apprehended at the US southern border. Mexico is refusing to defend it's southern border because they know not a single one of these illegals want to live in Mexico - they all want to make it to the US. Mexico is implicit in enabling the illegal alien traffic into this country. Tax every single wire transfer going to Mexico at 100% until Mexico decides to do something about their side of the border.
